titleStmt.title: A faithful account of the manner of the election of Sir William Poultney, and Sir William Waller, Knights to serve as members of the ensuing Parliament at Oxford, for the city of Westminster, and the liberties thereof, upon Thursday the 10th of February, 1680/1 : in answer to a letter from a person of quality in London.
titleStmt.author: L. S.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
